SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Tired_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>I screamed so much, I lost my voice.<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:0:0> <sp:0:2:2:5000>But I can croak
out a "thank you."<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You really saved me!<sp:5:1:0> I simply must repay
you.<sp:5:0:0> Take it, it's the least I can do!
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Well, that got my heart racing!<sp:5:0:0> You really
are a good fighter!
Thanks01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>You saved me! Thank you, thank you,
thank you! <sp:5:1:0>Please, take this.
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseL_01>Wait, you're here to help? <sp:5:0:0>My hero!<sp:5:0:0>
Or you will be, once you save me!
Talk01_00:
I'm sure you know that Zonai devices will
pop out when you put in stuff related to
Zonai civilization...
But did you know that the number of
devices you'll get varies based on how
much stuff you toss in there?
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>You should have seen my face when I
put in <clr:0000>a bunch of those sparkling things<clr:ffff>,
only to be met with a torrent of devices!
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>In my book, that's proof positive that
those sparkly things contain an incredible
amount of power.
Should you find yourself in want of Zonai
devices, I recommend you give it a try.
Talk99:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hold on...<sp:5:1:0> I feel like I've seen you
somewhere...<sp:5:1:0> Oh, I remember now!
Talk100:
<snd:Happy_00>I think I'll rest a while, then hit the road.
<sp:5:1:0>I'll let you know how my research is
proceeding when we meet again!
Atacked01: <sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Wha— <sp:5:0:0>You!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>Now is REALLY not the time to talk!
Talk01_01:
I'm sure you know that Zonai devices will
pop out when you put in things tied to
Zonai civilization...
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>But I was certainly surprised when I put in
<clr:0000>a bunch of those sparkling things<clr:ffff> and
received a torrent of devices in return!
In my book, that's proof positive that
those sparkly things contain an incredible
amount of power!
Talk99_01: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Oh, look who it is!<sp:5:1:0> We meet again!
AfterFailed:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Nuhhh...<sp:5:0:0> Visions of Zonai devices, floating
before my eyes...<sp:5:1:0> Please leave me be for
a while...
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Tired_01>It's a good thing you showed up when
you did—I was about to start sobbing!
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Unconscious_00>Ouch... That will leave a mark or two...<sp:0:4:0>Hm.<sp:5:0:0> I know investigations are supposed
to be dangerous, but this is starting to
seem downright fatal.
GoodBye00_01a:
There's one east of here in <clr:0000>Kakariko
Village<clr:ffff>, so I was thinking I might go to
investigate further.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_01>Whew! <sp:5:0:0>My heart's still hammering!
That sure was a brush with death.
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>If only some brave passerby could have
helped me out... <sp:5:1:0>I thought I was done for.
GoodBye00_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>You and I met back in Tarrey Town, didn't
we?<sp:5:0:0> In front of that <clr:0000>thing that dispensed
Zonai devices<clr:ffff>?
I'm pretty sure I saw you put stuff into
that machine and get Zonai devices out...
GoodBye00_01b:
There's something similar at <clr:0000>Digdogg
Suspension Bridge <clr:ffff>to the southwest, so
I thought I might go investigate.
After00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>You're the one who got those <clr:0000>Zonai
devices <clr:ffff>out of that gadget in Tarrey
Town, right?
Talk02_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>It seems my hypothesis was correct! The
machines in different locations do indeed
dispense different <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>!
In other words, if you're after a specific
Zonai device, you'll need to <clr:0000>choose your
dispenser carefully<clr:ffff>.
So each time I want to research a
different Zonai device, I need to head
to a different location.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_01>I would normally recommend that you
make note of where you can get your
preferred Zonai devices...
But you look like the sort who already
marks that type of info on his map.
GoodBye00_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>If you're so inclined, you might want to
go take a look yourself!<sp:0:4:0>You never know, it might contain different
<clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> than the Tarrey Town one.
Talk02_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_01>It seems my hypothesis was correct! The
machines in different locations do indeed
dispense different <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>!
I would normally recommend that you
make note of where you can get your
preferred Zonai devices...
<snd:Happy_01>But you look like the sort who already
marks that type of info on his map!
Talk00_00:
It seems like the way to actually get
Zonai devices out of them is to <clr:0000>put in
something related to Zonai civilization<clr:ffff>.
<snd:Happy_01>You'll get <clr:0000>something different every time<clr:ffff>
too, so you should try putting different
things in to see what will come out!
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_01>Honestly...I feel myself on the verge of
tears.<sp:5:0:0> Tears of fear, sure, but also tears
of joy over being rescued!
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare_01>I know I should r-run, but...<sp:5:1:0>I-I'm so
shaken, I can't even m-move!
GoodBye01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>As ever, I'm studying those strange
machines that dispense <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>.
